One of the other Matrons declared "But first we will have to diaper the baby"

Jessica gives her a look of horror "Lady I'm a grown women what do you mean diaper me?"

The male guard called a colleague on his walking talkie then declared "It in hard a female colleague is on the way we have supplies for this sorts of situations"

Moments latter a female guard appeared and quickly took charge of Jessica. They first stopped by the security office where the guard picked up a bag from a locker, then onto the ladies restroom.

"Please" Jessica pleaded with her, "You've got to believe me. I'm not a school girl-- I'm not who I appear to be, I'm really a grown up!"

The bored guard looked at her and rolled her eyes.

"Whatever you say, honey," she said. "Let's however get you out of those wet panties"

With that, the guard easily lifted poor Jessica up onto the 'baby's changing station' supplied in the ladies toilet. Jessica blushed hotly as the women pulled off her cotton panties.

"Wha.. wha... what's that?" Jessica asked somewhat stupidly as the female guard pulled out what was obviously a disposable diaper from the bag.

"Now sweetie, we can't have you having accidents all over the place, now can we honey?" she nonchalantly responded, then added "We don't want to make unnecessary work for the poor cleaners now do we. Now be a doll and lift your bottom please"

Jessica was to stunned to respond so the guard practically pulled her up and slid the diaper under her. She squealed when the pads came into contact with her rather sore bottom. With obvious expertise from prior experience in diapering babies, the guard quickly taped the diaper on and pulled up a pair of plastic pants. Then she stood Jessica up on her feet.

Poor Jessica was almost in shock. She just couldn't belief what had just happened to her. How could a grown up women with an important professional reporter job like hers find herself back in diapers! Jessica was used to people like this lowly female guard doing what she told them. Now that women had diapered her in spite of her clear protestations!

Jessica instantly hated the diapers and found they were hot and sticky. Even worse she could feel the heat rising in her plastic pants. It was a far cry from the silken panties and pantyhose that she was used to wearing!

As they left the ladies room, poor Jessica cringed as she heard the plastic rustling from beneath her equally hideous jumper. Worse, she soon realized form the various snide looks she got that the bulky diaper was plainly visible to all!

The staff from St Mary's were waiting by the back entrance and quickly took control of poor Jessica and lead her outside. Naturally she was protesting all the way, but of course no one paid any attention. They just assumed she was a naughty girl having a silly tantrum and deserved what was happening.

"But you don't UNDERSTAND!" she yelled. "I don't need to go to school. I'm a GROWN UP"!

The two matrons just laughed and one warned ""Sure you are honey, grown up women throw tantrums and wear diapers all the time. You just keep that up as I'd like to see what the sister's will say when they hear that load of crap coming from your mouth. If you'll take my advice, you'll be quiet as a mouse as we go back to school and when you get your punishment for trying to run away"

With that, the lady put Jessica in the van and strapped her securely in place so she couldn't do another run. She saw there were two other girls--obviously the ones who had tried to run away. Jessica just couldn't understand why these these people didn't get it that she wasn't one of them.

Jessica fumed as she sat in the back of the van with the two other girls not having much choice about the matter. Her bottom was still stinging from the recent spanking and the blasted diapers were becoming very uncomfortable. She desperately tried to formulate a plan of escape but for some reason none came. To her, it seemed so hopeless; after all, how do you escape from childhood?

With effort she pushed these melancholy thoughts aside and started to think strategically. Clearly, she reasoned, it was a simple matter of transformation-- she just needed to somehow get back home. In her home, her adult life was waiting-- her ID, her job, her clothes, her grown up underwear, in fact her entire life.

Of course, she realized that was easier said then done. As she was sitting in the bus heading to a rather secure reform school, she had no money, no identification, and no car. Even worse she was dressed as a schoolgirl and people actually believed that she was only a child.

The van was driven through the rather imposing gates of the school and up the drive to the administration building. A stern faced nun was waiting for the run away girls.

"It's Sister Betrace!" said one of the girls in clear horror. That reaction didn't sound good to Jessica.

"The horrid old witch" said the other girl with equal intrepitation "There's a rumour going around that she has a broomstick and can actually fly!"

The van stopped and all the girls were released from their restraints then quickly piled out.

The girls were told to line up and Sister Bertrace walked up and down, looking at each of them with an extremely critical eye.

"I'm disappointed in all of you," she said with menace in her voice "You all know better than to try to run away. You should certainly know better than to go to the mall-- that's the first place we look for runaways!"

She paused in her harangue and looked at Jessica somewhat critically then frowned.

"Child, I don't know you-- are you a new student? And what's this?" she asked, seeing Jessica's diapers and plastic pants peeking out from under the hem of her jumper.

The other girls snickered, but became silent at a frosty glance from the sister.

"Umm...." Jessica replied, blushing a bright crimson "Can I speak with you alone?" she nervously asked. She decided she would have to take a chance and tell this nun the truth. Hopefully, she could help her out and get her back home.

"I'm going to speak to each of you alone" the nun said to Jessica in a very ominous tone.

113.content:
The Girl Scouts in this town prefer the traditional Brownie Scout dress with orange tie, black belt and beret, and white socks & undies with brown shoes. It was eerie how much Jessica looked the part as she left the dressing booth intent on catching the girl who’d played the clothing switcheroo on her.

Strutting out of the booth to go looking for the actual Girl Scout, Jessica is alarmed when a woman cries out, “Kristy! Kristy Hildebrand! Stop right there, young lady! You are in so much trouble!” and grabs her by the upper arm, practically dragging her out of the shop and down the mall walkways, even as Jess tries to explain what has actually happened to her.

“You know, when I agreed to take you along with our troop on today’s excursion, I had a funny feeling about the whole thing. Now I see why! You just love getting into mischief, don’t you, Kristy? Well that’s not how our troop operates, and if you don’t stop the shenanigans, you’ll get a good taste of what I’m talking about!”, the woman continues on, berating her as she literally forces her along with her until they reach a small gaggle of younger girls all waiting in an orderly line-up with another woman troop leader.

“There you are! Was she much trouble, Mrs. Cummings?”, inquired the other troop leader.

“Nothing I couldn't handle. You know, she’d snuck into a lady’s boutique, rather than stay with the rest of the troop looking for snacks for today’s excursion! I tell you, this one is the Dickens, Mrs. Brundidge.”, replied Mrs. Cummings, the woman who discovered her at the dressing booths.

Hands on Jessica’s shoulders now, Mrs. Brundidge told Jessica in all seriousness, “Now Kristy…” to which Jessica immediately raised objection, “But I’m not Kristy! My name is”, and Jessica went on, explaining how she was an adult and had just moved to town and…

But Mrs. Brundidge sternly rebuked her, “That is preposterous, Kristy! Now I don’t want to hear any more lip from you and you will sit in the back of the bus and not make a sound on our field trip to...

Jessica stood there, pondering her unusual situation. She eyed the “Sunday’s Best”-looking poofy white, flowered dress laying hastily folded on the bench of the corner dressing room. Accompanying it were some matching white lace gloves and stockings, and pretty white girl’s heels. There were even two big white bows for her hair.

As she saw the sales lady returning empty-handed from her brief inspection of the store entrance and mall courtyard beyond, Jessica looked beyond the woman only to see a lovely blonde girl (working her outfit better than she ever could) with her purse, speeding away as fast as her stolen heels would take her, away from the shop.

Jessica had to think quickly! She had just enough time to quickly slip into the darling dress ensemble, and look to the entire world like a pretty girl all dressed up for church. If she hurried, she might be able to catch up with the actual owner of the dainty white dress, and make the young prankster hand her things back over to her. Or, she could just take off running after the girl right now, while she had her sights on her, out of the store and possibly breaking the law in the sexy red unpaid-for dress she had on.

Or, as Jessica ponders the above actions, the sales lady returns before she is able to explore either option, and she is forced to try to explain her situation, and rely on the kindness and understanding of the sales woman or her boss.

11512.content:
Jessica has hardly got to her feet, before a scrawny hand clutches firmly onto her shoulder. It hauls her into a pew, as she squirms. Head twisting she tries to keep an eye on the door.

"Sit down and behave, Jessica."

Looking up, as she does for everyone, Jessica sees the dour face of a nun.

The heavy hand drives her harshly down to land with a thump on the unpadded pew. The astonishingly firm hand stays in place keeping her down.

"I'm not Jessica.... Well, I'm not your Jessica." she protests, getting flustered, as the nun arches an eyebrow, disbelief written all over her face.

"You may be a new pupil, Jessica Jasmine Jones, but I'm not new to my job."

Her free hand slapping Jessica across her bare legs.

"I'm Jessica Summers." she hissed, hoping the nun would understand and relent.

Looking around, Jessica saw all the other girls dressed in variants of the outfit she was wearing. Her heart sank a little, as she had to admit the nun's confusion was easier to understand than she wanted to admit. A second glance at the towering figure, allowed her to see the ugly glasses she had on, and the incredibly thick lenses, too.

"Liars get punished." The nun snarled back, the same low volume, but as determined.

"I'm not." Jessica answered, though it sounded more petulant, than resolute and did nothing to convince the nun of her mistake. Jessica wasn't even sure she'd heard her.

Knowing the thief's name should have felt better. But the nun effortlessly lifted Jess back to her feet, as the organ started playing for another hymn.

The black plastic with the creepy smiling faces that covered their own faces made them all look a like. The only thing that differentiated them were slight differences in size and the horrid number emblazoned on their jacket pockets. Jessica was added to the line placed in sixth position. With a deep shudder Jessica realized they had all been reduced to nothing but a numbered commodity.

The six of them had to wait a good half hour. Behind the curtain Jessica could hear the auditorium slowly full with restless girls. She then heard someone wearing heels walk onto the stage and guessed it was finally the school Head Mistress. She coughed and the room suddenly fall silent. She then began "Girls all our would be escapees have now all been recaptured. To try and escape from St Mary's reform school was rather foolish of them, so far no girl has successfully done that and no girl ever will"

She the loudly clicked her fingers and the curtains dramatically opened to show the six of you "These girls are the six fools who tried to escape. As you can see each of them has been placed in a veil of shame so no one can see their faces. Anyone who is thinking of attempting to escape let me warn you how unpleasant they are to wear. Not only are the girls heads sealed in them but all of them are gagged. Already they will be feeling uncomfortable, imagine how those masks will feel after a month of wearing and how smelly they will become"

All the girls in the audience gasped and shuddered on mass. The Head Mistress then clicked her fingers "Number six step forward and turn around"

Jessica reluctantly did that. She felt so full of shame as she was not only singled out but also forced to expose her diaper for all to see. The Head Mistress then snapped out "This one was the ring leader so is getting additional punishment and will smell a lot worse than her sisters much of the time"

She then gave Jessica diapered posterior a tap to draw the audience attention to the diaper "We will not be wasting diapers on this one so changes will be infrequent. As you know not all girls return from the punishment nursery"

Poor Jessica anxiety went through the roof on hearing that...
1233121112.title: Jessica was then paraded around the school for ...

choices: lets start you off in a playpen
lets start you off in your personal cot
12331211121.content:
The Head Mistress then snidely declared "Nurse take her away, I no longer wish to see her hideous plastic face"

Without a word the Nurse then lead poor and deeply humiliated Jessica of the stage and pass taunting and tittering students. She then lead her a short distance then turned down an ominously dark corridor. Along it she soon came to a set of locked reinforced glass doors and jingled a chain of keys to find the one to open it, she then lead Jessica a short distance to a second set of doors and did likewise. Clearly this little ritual was highlighting for new inmates of the punishment nursery how secure the place was.

Inside the nursery Jessica saw that all the windows were bared and high up, giving no views to the outside. In the background a painful childish song was piped through the room on some cycle of repeat. The whole place was painted an antiseptic white but did have some childish transfers here and there. Although it was called a nursery all the inmates were her age or older, or rather her apparent age.

All clearly wore the same shameful diapers that she did. Although she was the only one wearing a mask, all the inmates wore gags that looked like large pacifiers. Half the inmates were locked in cots and the other half were in playpens dotted around the nursery. Those out of cots all wore baby harnesses and many had some type of additional restriction. She also noticed large change tables and several high chairs dotted around the room.

The nurse then declared in a sing song voice "As you can see sweetie all the babies here have a very contained and structured life. All for their own good of course. They spend much of their time in their personal cots and then on a very structured schedule get let out for changing, cleaning, feeding and of course exercise time in a playpen"

Jessica gulped nervously looking about with horror as the Nurse pauses to let that sink in. She then continues "I promise you that it wont take long to get use to the routine here, we deliberately keep it very simple. We would hate to over stimulate any of you"

Jessica shudders thinking how mindlessly boring the place would be, aside from its nasty petty unpleasantness. In that sickly sing voice the nurse then declares "Well girl
12331211121.title: She was then taken to the punishment Nursery

choices: To the hose next to the house
12333.content:
Jessica assumes that country folk are usually known for their prudish ways and their kindly hospitality, so whoever lives in the run down old house below might help her get cleaned up and let her borrrow some clothes, and maybe even give her a lift back into town. She could see an old pick-up truck in the yard, so there was at least one automobile that appeared to be in working shape. On the other hand, the people living down the hillside might be some kind of scary inbred yokels capable of things Jess didn’t even want to consider, if she just showed up at their front door naked and covered head to boots in mud.

Jess finds a small path that leads down and away from the main trial, presumably down to the farm house below. She makes her way down the path timidly trying to cover up her mud-covered, naked body. Jess wanders past the signs of people having been on this little trail. She sees wrinkled pages from some old men's magazines laying around, and then comes across a small clearing with blackened remnants of a small campfire in the middle. She can smell the scent of urine from the nearby bushes, too.

The side trail ends at the fence to the yard with the clothes drying on the line, the pick-up truck, and an inflatable kiddy pool. there is a sign that reads NO TRESPASING! (sic) dangling high up on the fence and two of the boards are missing, leading right into some flower bushes in the back yard, which allows jessica a better view of the yard.

She doesn't see any signs of a dog, though she does see chickens wandering around, pecking at the ground. Jess also notices signs of a toddler in the family. There are the scattered toys one might expect of a young child laying here and there in the grasses and flowers of the front yard. This is reassuring to her, as there must be a young mother living there, and they usually have more human compassion than most people. She also spotted a long rubber hose on a spool next to the house. Perhaps Jess could use it to hose off the caked-on mud. Things seemed quiet, so Jess snuck her way further into the yard...
12333.title: Naked and Mud-Covered

123331.content:
Jessica slowly crossed the yard to the kiddie pool. She felt as if the whole universe was working against her. First she lost her ID and all her clothes. Now she is baked in sloppy and thick brown mud. Quickly Jessica moved towards the kiddie pool hid right behind one of the flower bushes. She knew it was risky but Jessica ran right through toward the kiddy pool. Just to get even more disappointment.

What Jessica had thought was a kitty pool full of water was actually just some murky looking stuff. Sure it might be water but is it really worth getting rid of the mud? Jessica knew that she would have been caught if she tried to use the hose. So right now she saw too options, one is to use the murky water which might even be full of mud or move along to some other house. She had seen a couple more in the area.

Jessica darted her head side to side and..
123331.title: Towards the kiddy pool

choices: Delmont offers to spray her with the hose
Delmont chases her around the yard like a greased pig
123332.content:
As Jessica tried to sneak into the muddy front yard, she could make out a radio playing country or gospel music inside the dilapidated old house. A fat cat sat and stared bemusedly at her on a window sill. Although the mud was quickly drying all over her body, her mud-filled boots were making a terrible “Splorsh!”-sound with her every timid step.

         Pausing just yards away from the open window playing the radio, Jessica was just about to try the hose when she heard a deep-but-childish sounding voice behind her say, “Hi there! My name’s Delmont. What’s yur name? You sure are mud-covered! I bet I can catch you just like I was catching a loose piggy. Wanna play? You can be the piggy, and I’ll try to get you! Yee-Haw!”

         Jessica froze in place as the huge, slow-witted 15-year-old Delmont approached her getting more and more worked-up having someone to play with. Shivering at the thought of this oversized child touching her, Jessica nervously said, “W-wait! D-Delmont, my name is Jessica. I just want to use your hose to wash off. Okay? I can’t stay and play with you.”

         A perplexed look overcame Delmont’s naturally mongoloid countenance as he processed what she managed to sputter out.
123332.title: To the hose next to the house

choices: The girls tell her your a new student that went to the wrong building
You explain who you are, she believes you
You explain who you are, she thinks your lying and canes you too
124.content:
Jessica smiled, it was a nice day. You decided to just keep walking. Enjoying the gentle breeze and the sunshine while you wandered the park and were amazed with both its size and beauty.

As the sun began to set, you headed back to your new home and had a nice meal. The rest of the week you spent most of your time unpacking and going on little walks to learn the area well. Finally it was Monday morning though and time to start your job.

Dressed in a tight black skirt and white top you made sure your padded underwear was on straight before heading into the newspaper office building. You greeted people as you passed, though there was a bit of doubt over your identity and age at reception, the tall, very busty woman talking down to you "are you sure your not a bit young to be in here little girl?" She mocked as you frowned, showing your ID. Clearly this woman was not destined to be your friend.

Her name was Scarlet and she had a lot of reporters wrapped around her little finger. She clearly didn't feel threatened by your petite figure and her height in heels actually had you feeling smaller than ever. She handed you your press pass "Mr Mason says your to go interview the teachers at St Mary's. He wants to see what you can do" she said, acting as a middle man (woman?) between you and your new boss.

You were reluctant to go without meeting Mr Mason yourself but didn't want to cause problems on your first day. You caught a cab to the school gates and stared through them at the intimidating set of buildings. A teacher who introduced herself as Mrs Trip led you inside once you explained who you were. She told you how there was the junior school building and the senior school, each with their own uniforms and teachers.

Mrs Trip taught in the senior building and explained senior teachers rarely went into the junior building and vice versa. You followed her around writing notes in your note book and even sat in on one of her chemistry classes. You were a bit embarrassed that even in heels, the school girls towered over you.

Class was going well until a group of girls decided to cause a accident as a prank and chemicals exploded, soaking you from head to toe. Mrs Trip apologised and offered to find you something to wear while your clothes were cleaned. She smiled "I'll even let you sit in on the girls caning for this little incident!"

Eager to witness their punishment procedure up close for your notes you agreed. Though once it became obvious that the only thing that fit you was a junior uniform you were less thrilled. Unlike the seniors skirt and blouse, the juniors wore knee socks, a blouse and a penifore dress. Mrs Trip couldn't help but chuckle with how little you looked in the outfit.

Unfortunately your padded underwear had been soaked so you were also wearing school panties and a camisole, leaving you really looking like a student, especially as the chemicals had stripped you of make up.

Down at the principles office the naughty girls were told to sit down on the bench to await their caning and Mrs Trip left to get your clothes cleaned. You slowly began to feel nervous as the girls glared at you, whispering to each other and then smirked.

You realised your ID had been taken with your clothes and you were about to tell the secretary when the principles office opened and a woman in a smart suit walked out "you girls are in big trouble...what are you doing in this building young lady?" She asked, shocked to see a junior student in the senior school. She had no idea you were an adult.
124.title: Continue her walk

1242.content:
You look up at her and tell her your story.
“I am a reporter and was guided through the school. This bratty girls over their soaked me in some chemicals and ruined my expensive clothes. Mrs Trip is trying to have them cleaned, while I was invited to watch the canning of the girls.”

The smiles have vanished from the girls faces while the secretary nods her head.
“Okay, if that is the case, come in and have a seat. I am sure the principal will be happy to have a helping hand. It is his last day and he is not the youngest anymore. His replacement should come in tomorrow.”

You and the girls are guided into the principal’s office.

The dark room is dominated by a large oak desk and a bizarre locking spanking bench with a can and a paddle waiting on top of it.
“Ah, that must be the big naughty girls – and a young naughty girl as well?!” The old principal says.
He is looking like Dumbledore from the old Harry Potter movies, only with a shorter beard.

“No sir! I am Jessica a reported that was victim of the girls prank. I am here to assist you.”
You quickly clarify, afraid to end over the bench as well.

“That is nice, please take the cane. I think each should have 50 strokes. I leave the honour to you. My back hurts and I am not in shape to swing the cane.”
The principal says.

Hateful looks hit you, when the secretary positions the first girl over the bench. She pulls down the girls panties and lifts her skirt up, leaving the behind of the girl as a perfect target.

“Don’t dare to wipe me!” She girl hiss at you, but the principal in the back chuckles and says: “Ignore them, they always complain when it comes to the punishment. Don’t go easy on them!”

You gulp down hard.
You have never caned somebody, but with the brats that ruined your clothes it might be a pleasure. You take a deep breath and bring the can down on the girls behind, leaving a little red line.

The girl yelps, but the secretary nods her head and encourages you to go on, so you do.
You continue until the girl is crying big tears and her behind is covered in red lines from the can.

With four girls you need to bring the cane down 200 times and in the end you understand why the principal was giving the honour to you. It was quiet exhausting to cane them.

“Very good, I think you have something to write for your article. Now please leave me alone, I need to pack my personnel stuff.” The principal says.

Happily smiling you walk into the corridor. The door close behind you and you look for Mrs Trip with your closes, but she is not in sight.
A hand grabs your shoulder and you realize that you are alone in an empty corridor – with four girls that you just caned merciless…
1242.title: You explain who you are, she believes you

choices: Mrs Trip guesses you have been put in junior school by mistake (Rescue)
Mrs Trip assumes you went away with your story, if not your clothes (Trapped)
12421.content:
The girls are smiling at you with kind grins that did not reach their eyes. "I bet you thought you were really clever little girl" The first one growled, you gulped "I..im not a little girl, im an adult. take your hands off me" You said, trying to keep your voice level and with some authority. However, the girls rage and your current attire of a junior student demolished any hope of that. She nodded to the others and suddenly you had a hand clamped down over your mouth, while three others grabbed your limbs and lifted you up.

Struggling between the girls, you realised how strong they were, they easilly carried you along before one of them spotted the Secutarys desk. it was empty, she was obviously off doing something, however she had left her computer logged in. "Hey girls ive got the best idea!" The one holding your legs put you down, while her friends kept a tight grip on you. She went to the computer and quickly looked through the system. As you grunted into one of the girls hands trying to struggle free without success, you watched her typing away on the computer.

"Ok, move her infront of the camera!" She said with malicious glee. The girls obeyed and when she signalled them, the one holding your mouth shut moved her hand. There was a quick flash of light as it took your picture and the hand was clamped back over your mouth before you even thought to cry out for help. You didn't know what they were doing but it didn't seem like it would end well for you. They tugged you over to the desk and put your hands down on some sensor pad. It scanned your hands and beeped. The girls laughed "Well thats her registered. lets just get her over to where she belongs now!" The one at the computer said as something was printed out. It had come out laminated and as she clipped it to the uniform you wore, you realised it was a Student ID. It had your picture on it and had the name "Betty Summers" along with the tag "Junior student"

Your eyes went wide as they laughed, dragging you off. They had registered you in as a new student. In your file they had put how you had an overactive imagination, was a compulsive liar and was a flight risk. To make matters worse, even if you escaped, you would me flagged as a truent student thanks to your fingerprint scans and file. The police would bring you right back here.

As they got to the door dividing the junior school from the senior school, they had their ids scanned, which let them through. You realised that with a Junior ID you wouldnt be let back into the senior side, which meant you couldn't get to Mrs Trip. When they saw a teacher in the hall, they quickly let go of your mouth but kept a firm grip on your arms. "Miss, we have a new student for you here!" They called cheerfully. The woman turned, a stern looking woman with black hair in a tight bun walked towards you. "NO they are lying, im an adult. im a reporter, they were being punished and they.." You tried to explain but the woman quickly silenced you with some sort of sticky pacifier she pulled out. It swelled to fill your mouth and made you practically silent. "What a rediculous lie, girl." She scolded before smiling at the seniors "Good girls, thank you for bringing her along. you may go." They smiled and giggled as they walked away. She grabbed your arm and dragged you towards a class room.

"I do not tolerate liars in my class little miss Summers, when i take out your pacifier later you would do well to remember that!" She said. Dragging you into a class of girls about your size, if not slightly taller, she introduced you and sat you down at a desk. You looked around in horror, realising how well you fit in at this classroom. Gagged and stuck in the junior side, all you could do was hope Mrs Trip came and found you. You let out a muffled whimper as you sat there listening to your new teacher start her lesson...
12421.title: The girls seek revenge

choices: She keep it and use it.
124212.content:
Back in the corridor is the senior part of the school Mrs. Trip is walking around carrying a bag of clothes, all nicely washed, dried and even ironed. She still feels sorry for Jessica and wanted to be sure everything is perfectly fine before she brought the clothes back.
She had already asked the principal and his secretary, but they had no clue where Jessica was. In the end she found one of the seniors that had been spanked, but they had bad news or her:
“Oh that LADY called her partner and got fresh clothes before she left.”

Mrs. Trip sighs and dug into the bag, getting out a mobile phone, keys and a little wallet with Jessica’s papers. “But I still have those?!”

The girl gulps and quickly grins sheepishly:
“Yes, she asked me to send it after her. He had a long talk and she thought she can trust me.”

Mrs. Trip thought about it, but found nothing suspicious about it. It would be easier for her is somebody else send the stuff away. She had wasted enough time for Jessica.
“Okay Silvia, I give it to you, but promise me to send it to her. We want no official complains.”

The girl (Silvia) smiles and takes the bag.
“No problem Mrs. Trip I make sure she will not complain.”

Silvia takes the bag to her room and is not sure what she should do.
She can throw everything away – or use it to trap Jessica further into her new fate.
124212.title: Mrs Trip assumes you went away with your story,...

choices: "You have to believe me, i am a reporter. go find Mrs Trip!"
"...Yes Miss, I'll be a good girl...no more lies" play along for now...
1242122.content:
Silvia smiled to herself as she went to her dorm room, looking through Jessica's note book with everything she had written about the school, chuckling to herself knowing that little "Betty Summers" would be getting a first hand experience of the school for a long time. After reading through the notes and copying them down into text form on Jessica's phone, she sent them to the email address stored in it for the News company. She also added the message "Hey its Jessica, sorry to spring this on you suddenly, but Ive just gotten news that my mom is sick, im heading home to look after here. Concider this my notice, i hope these notes help you with your story" She tried to make it sound professional before clicking send and grinning like a cheshire cat as her alibi to keep people from noticing the womans absence was sent off.

With that sorted, she pocketed the money from the purse and took out the cards. Seeing Jessica's ID and the proof that she was an adult. Silvia quickly tossed it in the metal waste paper bin and used some matches to set it alight. She watched the plastic card warp and melt as it burnt, the picture and details melting away. Without that card or her press pass, there was no way for Jessica to prove she wasn't Betty Summers, especially as her Retina, photo and fingerprints were now in the system under that name. Silvia rubbed her sore butt with a smirk "Serves her right" She muttered to herself before folding Jessica's clothes up amongst her own plains clothes. They were high quality and she didn't see the need to throw them out when she could keep them for herself.

Back over in the junior building, Jessica was still tugging in vain at the pacifier that had been popped in her mouth. The inflated bulb stopping her getting it back past her teeth and the teacher scolding her for not paying attention. She was near tears, she was a grown woman and she was trapped in the junior side of St Mary's school. She spent the rest of the day hoping that Mrs Trip would come and find her but there was no sign of her. During recess she stared out at the street, her hands gripping the bars as she watched the people walk past. She let out a muffled whimper through the gag as all the kids she blended in with, played around her.

When the classes ended for the day the stern woman, a teacher you had discovered was called Mrs Yanders pushed a tiny hole in the pacifer with a key like device and you felt it deflate. She pulled out out "Now, Betty, no more lies. If you lie this goes right back in. Are you going to be a good little girl?" She said with a raised eyebrow. You gulped, looking at the pacifier gag in her hand and said..
1242122.title: She keep it and use it.

choices: She quickly goes to the toilet.
12421221.content:
The whole lesson you waited for that moment. As soon as the dummy is out of your mouth your say:
“You have to believe me, I am a reporter. Go find Mrs Trip!"

Mrs Yanders shakes her head and quickly pushes the dummy back in. You grab it and try to pull it out, but the bulb is already inflated again.
“Okay, if you keep telling stories… I warned you!”

Mrs. Yaders grabs your hand and pulls you to the next chair. She sits down and against all resistance, pulls you over her lap.
“You will learn to tell me the truth.” She says and starts to spank your behind.

Being spanked is a new experience for you. Your parents did not believe in spankings and so you are not prepared for the pain that floods your body, starting in your behind.
Within seconds you cry like a baby.
The dummy makes it worth, since you have problems to breath, with tears filled eyes and runny nose. You feel your bladder twist and a few drops escape into your panties.

Finally the spanking is over and Mrs. Yaders helps you to your feet.
“Now go to your next lesson. Maybe Mrs. Hard can convince you to tell the truth.”

Wiping tears and snot from your face you quickly run out of the room. You have no clue where the next lesson will happen – and as much as you would like to go to the bathroom, you better run for your next lesson. You are already late.

**

Over in the Senior Dormitories Silvia walks by the main school office and sees the Computer unlocked again.
Quickly she sits behind it and Find your file – that is basically empty – except for the few details she had typed in the first time.
She clicks on HISTORY and find an empty page.
“This might cause questions.” She thinks and starts to make up a background story.

“Betty Summers is a 12 years old problem child, taking away from a dinking father and a prostitute mother. She was in three foster families and is required to stay in the school dormitories until she turns 21. No other relatives are known, the teachers are authorised to use suitable punishments for her – estimated – bad behaviour.”

SAVE

Silvia is happy - for now - and goes to the medical file: EMPTY.
Cursing and looking over her shoulder she quickly types in:
Betty is a restless sleeper and needs rails or crib to avoid injures. Due to her bad childhood she often suffers some typical problems for such children, like thumb sucking and bedwetting.

Silvia hears a door closing and quickly press SAVE before she runs off.

**

In the other building Jessica finally found her room. She presses her legs together and takes a desperate look at the nearby bathroom. She is already late…
12421221.title: "You have to believe me, i am a reporter. g...

choices: The way this is worded...sounds like how a student would write...maybe
You see, you have a record. Now we need to punish this lying habit of yours
124212212.content:
Jessica knew she would get in trouble for being late, but there was no way she could hold it through an entire class. Quickly she rushed into the bathroom and practically flew into an open stall, locking it and pulling the school panties down to her ankles as she lifted her skirt and sat down. She let out a muffled sigh of relief as she heard the urine stream hit the water and the pressure on her bladder faded away like a bad memory.

It took a few minutes of peeing to drain the pressure and she quickly wiped herself, flushed, pulled her panties back up and washed her hands. Finally finished she walked back out into the corridor, intending to go to this class incase this other teacher was worse than the last. She was sure that Mrs Trip would find her and get her out of this mess, unaware that Mrs Trip thought she had left and wasnt even looking for the reporter.

She also didn't know that she now had a fully filled in file as a problem child that would make proving her identity all but impossible without her ID. Though the worst thing she didn't know about was that the school had Hall Monitors. As she walked out she saw a girl a bit taller than her, wearing a sash over her uniform that said "Monitor". The girl smirked at her "Where is your bathroom pass" She demanded, holding out her hand for a slip of paper you didn't have. She saw you blink in confusion and grinned "Out of class without a bathroom pass. oh dear hehe" She taunted before grabbing your arm.

She began to tug, which caused you to struggle back. She wasn't much stronger than you but it was enough that you were slowly being tugged along the hall. The school shoes you had been given slipping on the smooth floor as you tried to root yourself. It was no good though, soon you were dragged to the door of an office and the Hall Monitor knocked on the door. A tall blonde woman with her hair tied back in a professional bun opened it "Yes Melody?" She asked with a faint smile, which turned to a cold stare as her eyes moved to you. Melody smiled "I found this girl sneaking out of the bathroom during class time without a pass. She is already wearing a liars gag so i thought you would want to know" She said, giving you a shove in the back to push you towards the woman.

In her heels and her already tall frame, she towered over you. You really felt like a little girl staring up at her, in your uniform and pacifier, gulping and trembling, you didn't want another spanking. The woman thanked Melody and closed the door, walking back to her desk which said "Miss Argon, Junior head misstress" She clearly ran the junior part of the school. She pushed on your pacifier and it deflated, allowing her to pull it out. "now young lady, explain what you were doing out of class without a pass" She said sternly.

You gulped, quickly explaining how you had been spanked and really had to go and didnt want to wet yourself in class and apologised for being late. You then quickly tried one more time to explain your real identity, that you were not Becky, But Jessica. Miss Argon raised an eyebrow at your story and smirked slightly, looking you over. "What a rediculous tale, you barely look 11 child." She scolded sternly, but she went to her computer "And such an easy to prove lie as well" She said, bringing up your file and showing you. She began reading it all out, every single lie that was written about this identity you had been given.

As she finished reading you looked down at you and said...
124212212.title: She quickly goes to the toilet.

choices: Point your finger at the paddle
Point your finger at the training pants
Point at nothing, shaking your head
1242122122.content:
Miss Argon shock her head and raised the edge of her mouth to a pitiful, ignorant smile.
“Oh little Becky, by now you should know better than to tell this silly lies. Even if I do not know you – even your file say that you are a little liar and can’t be trusted an inch.”

“But… .”You tried to explain yourself again, but Miss Argon hushed you while she reached for a mean looking paddle.
Immediately you fell silent.

With a grin she hold the paddle like a waring, while she takes your pacifier and tuck the rubber-end into a green soapy slime.
“This will taste awful and maybe make you drool a little bit, but otherwise it would not be a punishment.” She smiles and pushed the soapy pacifier into your mouth.

You almost gag at the taste. The soap burns on your tongue and brought tears to your eyes. Your mouth waters right away and you are forced to gulp a big chunk of the soap down. The drooling starts as well and you have to wipe your chin like a little baby to save your school uniform.

“Now for your real punishment. When I look at your behind and the fear in your eyes, I bet you would not like another spanking.”

You shake your head and blush when you notice your hands automatically covered your behind at her words.

“So I offer you another punishment, which should be familiar to you – according to your file.”

You fear the worst and you are not disappointed when she reach into a cupboard and takes out babyish pink training pants.

Miss Argon laughs out by the look on your face.
“Oh come on, it could be worse - I have diapers as well. Now point your finger at your preference.”
1242122122.title: You see, you have a record. Now we need to puni...

12421221222.content:
Miss Argon lies you down, and removes you uniform. She looks at the diaper in her hand and pauses.

"This is supposed to be a punishment, and you're supposed to be wearing these.... in fact, you need another punishment for not wearing your diapers in the first place. So.... here's what we're going to do."

She opens another cupboard, and pulls out a very thick looking pink diaper. She powders you, then tapes the diaper around you, but pushes you back down when you start to get up. You look at her questioningly.

"That's the first punishment. Now... the second one is...."
12421221222.title: Point your finger at the training pants

choices: A free class, time to make friends..
The day is already over, up to the dorms.
124212212221.content:

133.content:
"This school is known for transforming 'troubled' girls into 'refined' young ladies." Stressing the two words, she said. "I am Natasha Wild, soul heir to a multi-billion dollar fortune." She sighed. "My father wants me to be a perfect princess before I reach adulthood."

"Only you are more like a tomboy." Smiling slightly, you guessed.

Natasha nodded. "Look, I don't have much time so I'll make this quick." Hurriedly, she said. "I will pay you one billion dollars cash if you will take my place in this school while I travel to tell mother about what father is doing to me, err, us."

"Exactly what will happen to me if I accept?" Suspicious, you asked. "Will you come back to bail me out of this school or leave me to rot in your place?"

"Everyone is released upon reaching adulthood." Simply, Natasha explained.

"I am an adult." Crossly, you countered. "I have a rare condition that left me looking like a small child."

Natasha sighed, frustration on her face. "I will come back with mother to have you released once I reach her." Desperate, she said. "The billion dollars is in my dorm room account. You can access it with my ID."

"You want to switch ID as well?" Startled, you asked.

"We look exactly alike." Smiling, Natasha said. "It's the perfect cover until I reach mother. She lives on the East Coast. One plane ride and I am there."

You bit your lip, wondering what to do. A school alarm sounding alerted you to the fact that time was running out, you had to decide.

1333.content:
"What are you doing there!?" Firmly, a guard barked. You turned around, startled, only to see a tall, muscular woman smile. "Oh, good day, Ms Darlene."

"Ms Darlene?" Curious, you asked. "I'm afraid you are mistaken."

The woman laughed, grabbing your arm as Natasha sneaked back into the bushes. "I was told you had a strange sense of humor." Smiling, the woman said. "I'm Frankie Storm, head of security here at St Marys School for Girls. You are very short, just as the dean said you would be."

You tried to protest but Frankie ignored you as she dragged you into the school to the dean's office. There, you met the dean of the school, Ms Tyrone. She was a tall, elderly woman with the body of an Amazon warrior. Everything about her spelled trouble in your mind. She dismissed Frankie and eyed you intently through her half moon glasses. "You are not the new teacher." With narrowed eyes, she said. "Who are you? What is your business here?"

"I tried to explain that to your head of security." Annoyed, you replied. "I am Jessica Summers, a reporter. I was merely born with a condition that left me looking like a small child." You sighed, producing you Identification and press card. "If you would just show me the door, I will gladly leave."

Ms Tyrone frowned deeply, looking at your ID and press card. "We can't have a reporter snooping around here!" Angry, she said. "We are on thin ice with the local and state authorities as it is!"

"Exactly why are you under such scrutiny?" Suspicious, you asked.

Ms Tyrone sighed. "That is a private matter which I will not discuss." Gruffly, she said. "All I will say is that the reports were all highly exaggerated."

Just then, the door opened and Frankie entered with a struggling Natasha in her arms. "I caught the rich kid making a break for it again!" Annoyed, she said. "Let me use the whip this time! I promise I won't leave any lasting bruises!"

"Not now, you fool!" Angry, Ms Tyrone barked.

"Don't you dare touch that child with a whip!" Angry, you blurted out. "I will have every law enforcement agency at your doorstep with a single phone call!"

Frankie looked at you stunned as Ms Tyrone growled. "This is not the new teacher but a reporter!" Barely remaining calm, she explained. "Now, she has seen too much!"

You turned around, horrified, hearing a grinding sound. Ms Tyrone had just sent your ID and press card through a shredder near her desk. "How dare you!" Furious, you screamed. "That's private property!"

"Students here have no rights when they first enter." Smugly, Ms Tyrone countered. "They must each earn those rights through good grades and proper behavior."

"New student?" Turning pale, you asked. "This is kidnapping!"

"I wish you luck proving that without proper ID." Smiling, Ms Tyrone said. She turned to Frankie. "Take this new student to me measured and dressed for classes! Also, be certain she knows the rules!"

You take a step back, knowing you were in serious trouble...

13411.content:
Jessica could tell the police officers were starting to size her up as she weighed her choices. Not wishing to appear suspicious herself, Jessica agrees to join the police inside the forbidding walls of the notorious private school.

“Yes, of course officers”, Jessica smiles nervously, anything I can do to help bring a truant student back safely within the walls of the famous St. Mary’s, you know?”

But as the tall iron gates closed behind the four of them, the older cop led the way while the escapee began to thrash and kick around in the arms of the younger officer. Jessica nervously brought up of the rear of the awkward procession. And she immediately regretted her decision to enter the dreaded institution on her first full day in town. It seemed almost as if the day darkened slightly just upon setting foot inside the dreary grey interior of the high walls of St. Mary’s, and Jessica gave a little shiver as she clutched her handbag tightly and followed through the courtyard, then up the steps of the main hall. When the solid oaken doors locked behind Jessica and she was undeniably trapped inside of this infamous reformatory sans safety net, she erupted in goosebumps and her heart beat faster, almost as if she were ready to take flight.

Jessica followed along so closely down the hall she accidentally ran right into the younger cop, who had by now reined in the still sobbing truant. His glare back at her from over his shoulder was enough to nearly cause petite Jessica to have an accident, and she became worried that he might realize she was wearing falsies to enhance her tiny chest and become suspicious of her.

The small entourage stopped for mere seconds before the door opened to reveal a stern looking nun with a wooden ruler and a sniffling little girl beside her, facing the corner of the car with her school dress on, but her undies down around her quivering knees. Jessica is forced in tightly beside this poor sobbing girl, and the look that the nun gives Jessica is enough for her to stand with her back towards the nun as everyone is packed into the elevator.

During a moment or two on the ride up to the admissions offices, the elevator lights flicker, and Jess feels a tug on her purse as she tries to keep it as tightly close as she can.

After the elevator doors have closed behind them and the nun and her charge head off down a hall in another direction, Jessica, the police, and the girl who had tried to get her to help escaping St. Mary’s arrive at the imposing admissions desk, from which a horrid toad of a woman with huge hair and thick granny glasses glares down at them. She croaks with laughter as she scolds the girl, “I tried to warn you, Vanessa. I told you: Just play by the rules and be a good student and someday you will be allowed to return home to your parents. But they entrusted us to make certain that you would be a good, obedient daughter upon your return. And this latest attempt isn’t endearing you at all to the caregivers trying to make a difference with your young lives! It’s off to Ward B for you now, widdle Vanessa for some of St. Mary’s patented Regression Therapy. It’s a shame that you’ll have to undergo a full behavior modification, but you’ve left us with our hands tied in the matter”, and with that, the old lady slams an old rubber stamp down on her forms declaring the runaway admissible to their bizarre infantilization technique for re-teaching girls proper behavior from the bottom up.

Jessica fretted as the girl she could have tried to save is led away into some super-creepy inner bowels of the place for their unusual brand of education, and is startled out of her revelry when she suddenly realizes the old woman at the admissions desk has just repeated a question for her, and the cops are now also appraising her more closely with the escapee recaptured.

“What? I’m sorry!”, blathered Jessica as she looked around at all of them guiltily.

“These nice Police Officers are willing to share the award money for the safe return of our missing angel, and I am trying to ascertain that this is indeed how you would like to proceed?”

“Yes! Of course. Right. Let’s do that.”, Jessica stammered as they seemed to eye her with renewed suspicion.

“You know, you don’t look familiar, dear. You wouldn’t mind if I asked you for some ID? It’s not that we’re not eternally grateful for your active participation in her return, of course. Just a formality really”, the old woman at the tall desk asks, while she files the papers for the former girl away in a cabinet behind her.

Jessica begins fumbling around in her purse. Then, fumbles some more, now slightly panicky. Soon she’s quivering all over as she realizes she can’t find her ID! It dawns on her that anyone could have filched her info...but she has no idea who!

Without her padded underwear, a similiar body shape too. Gritting her teeth, she was processed as an entirely new student. It was oddly degrading to see her name, and still be dismissed as too young to make any significant decisions.

A timetable was thrust into her hands, and after badgering, she was signed up to various classes. History, French, Maths, Science, Italian, and Gym. The timetable came out of the printer hot, and smelling faintly of ozone.

Again her name was in black and white at the top. Another reminder of her situation, and predicament.

"You'll tell me as soon as you confirm my ID?" Jessica asked sounding a little worried about the effort she expected from them.

"Of course, my dear." The nun's voice dripping in insincerity. Her hand rubbed her rump as she considered pointing out her tone.

"Thank you, that's all I ask." she said primly instead.

"Besides, if you do turn out to be a little liar, this time you'll get a good start to a productive life."

Again the nun's skepticism was far too clear for Jessica. Looking out the window, she saw the firmly locked gates, and the fence that was too high for her to climb. Her heart sank a little as she considered her near future. At least until she was confirmed as a fledgling journalist this was her world.

1342121211.content:
Jessica is sent to her first class, with a nun accompanying her to ensure she didn't wander off (Again!). Nervously fingering the edge of her ID card, she tried to focus on the long game. Soon (Hopefully Soon), she'd be back out and recognised as a journalist. This humiliating card not a sign of her imprisonment, instead evidence to back up her story and ensure she won an award for breaking this story wide open.

Her rump received a swat with a wooden ruler from the nun when she was accused of dawdling in the hallway. Her hands held behind her back, she tried to fend off these swipes. Her own yips, and squeals of pain another reminder of her precarious situation.

The nun firmly rapped on the door, when you reached the class. A stern "Come!" was heard through the door, and you were lead into the class. The walls were plastered with clichéd pictures from France. A map with different types of cheeses, another with different bottles of wine, both set to identify the different regions of France.

The stern nun running the class looked to be in her eighties.

"Entrez et bienvenue." She said clearly in a terrible accent.

A non to her sister, and you were left alone. With a swish, she pointed to an empty desk with an outstretched bamboo cane.

"Eeh... Merci beaucoup..." you answer.

When you reach your seat, "Well girl, introduce yourself." She snarled.

"I'm Jessica Summers, and I'm just here briefly..." She was shocked into silence as the cane landed with a loud crack, on one of the front desks.

Unsure, whether she'd crossed a line suggesting her stay might be brief, she stayed silent.

"En français." she said.

"Je m'appelle, Jessica Summers. Et j'étais une journaliste." Your accent perfected by a six-month assignment in Québec.

The cane cracks down again. Jessica shuddered as she stood there, already imagining it impacting her tender rear. A hiss of imagined pain, slipping between her teeth. On the verge of tears, she stopped, afraid to ask what was wrong, let alone object to the terrifying behaviour.

"I'll tolerate no liars in my class." She spat the words angrily, gesturing for Jessica to sit and a scowl warning her to be quiet.

"This is our newest start, and I hope none of you encourage her lies."

A glowering look daring you to contradict her.

Casting a glance around, you see only fright on the different faces, you don't see any resistance in the class. Any potential allies, were non-existent.

"I trust you'll all report any further attempts at lies, for me or any of the other sisters to rectify."

"Yes, Sister Anna." They chant back to her as one.

Jessica's hand shot up again to answer another question. Sister Anna looks around the room for other raised hands, and with an audible sigh, "Jessica Summers" waited for her to answer.

"J'habite dans la grande maison, dans la belle ville."

The scowl was unhidden, disappointment that she was right.

"Correct, J'habite dans la maison." Simplifying her answer, and repeating it for the whole class to hear.

As the bell rang for the class to end, Jessica felt disappointed. It was oddly calming to be able to answer the questions. But as she read her timetable, hunting for her next class, the rest of the girls filed out. She felt a number of bags clatter against her back and shoulders as they passed. Too many for it to be accidental. Belatedly, she knew she'd annoyed everyone in the room by knowing the answers.

Cementing her isolation. It was certain, if she told anyone the truth, she'd be reported as a liar, and punished appropriately.

The departing girls split automatically, as Sister Anna made her way to stand in front of Jessica's desk. The bamboo cane straining between her taut hands as she flexed it into an arch.

"I don't appreciate clever clogs, little miss smarty-pants." she hissed in a low whisper.

Far too late, Jessica knew she'd done worse than embarrass her class mates. She'd humiliated the teacher. She swallowed nervously, an apology bubbling incoherently from her lips. The punishment all too clear.

Jessica knew she couldn't walk all the way home with the girl, not with the police looking for someone in that distinctive uniform, so she called a cab. Not knowing the town, Jessica picked the first company her phone listed. Long minutes passed before a cab finally rolled up to her.

"The cab is here." Jessica said, calling the girl out of the bushes.

The cab driver was a middle-aged man, one with the air of having seen everything. Seeing that one of his passengers was in the bushes, he sighed.

"Is your friend peeing in the bushes? Then tell her to dry before she comes in. I hate getting pee on the seats."

Then the girl ran into the cab. The cab driver grunted when he saw her.

"Ah, a St. Mary's girl."

Jessica squeezed into the cab behind the girl.

"So, it's back to St. Mary's then?"

"No, we're going to..." Jessica begun.

The girl interrupted her.

"I'm coming from a costume party and I wore the wrong costume. Then my date wanted to fuck me in the bathroom and I said no so he left without me and I needed a ride home."

"Right. I hears that all the time. Especially after the dispatcher sends out a general broadcast about the police looking for a girl from St. Mary's. So Miss, are you turning this escapee in or not?"

134222.content:
"No, we aren't going to St. Mary's." Jessica said, then gave her home address.

The driver nodded and started driving. Minutes later they were at the school's front gate.

"Driver, I said we weren't going here." Jessica said.

"Sorry Miss, you did say that, but there's a cash reward for St. Mary's girls. Since you didn't want it I'll claim it. As for you, I'll testify about how you helped her escape. Maybe I'll get a double reward for that. Either way I'll get to see them spanking her."

"What?" Jessica exclaimed.

The escaping girl wailed, "No! Don't take me back there. I'll fuck you if you don't. You can spank me yourself. Just don't take me back!"

"Sorry, but I'm getting old. I'd rather had the cash than your sweet tail."

Jessica swallowed hard. She didn't want to be arrested. She thought that maybe if they found her spanking the girl then maybe they wouldn't believe that Jessica had helped her escape.

"They won't think I'm an accomplice if the open the gate and find me spanking her." Jessica declared.

"WHAT? NO WAY!"

The cab driver smiled at the scene in his review mirror as the two girls wrestled. The match ended with one of them in the traditional spanking position getting her tail swatted.

14.content:
Tote bag in hand, Jessica left her new home for the local pool only a few blocks away. Though she usually preferred heels and meticulous makeup before going out, she forewent them for a trip to the pool. It was no use touching up her make up only to get in the pool, and silly to walk back from the pool in high heels. So, instead, she was sans make up and wearing flip flops. She felt a touch under dressed, a tad exposed, but also a little excited.

She took her time in her walk, enjoying the sun and tying her hair back in a tight ponytail.

At the pool she briefly considered telling the skinny, lanky-haired boy at the counter that she was thirteen and thus young enough for the child's admission price, but stopped herself. The three dollar discount wasn't worth destroying all the work she'd done not to be seen as a child. A quick change in the locker room later and she was making her way to the pool, her sleek, black, one-piece swimming suit clinging to her like a second skin.

She started with a several laps, pulling herself along the lanes with long, sure strokes. She took a few dives, enjoying the feeling of a well-executed dive, relishing the cold, clear water on the hot day. She was considering between another set of laps or lounging on the poolside when a sharp crack of a voice intruded upon her relaxing morning.

"That's you too, missy! Out of the pool, it's time to go!"

Jessica looked up to see the most matronly woman she'd ever seen. A large-hipped, large-breasted woman in an unflattering one-piece and a showercap had her thick fists on her formidable hips and was glowering at her.

Jessica put on her best smile. It wasn't the first time she'd been mistaken for someone else, and she'd perfected her response. But before she could get a word out, the matron bent, grasped Jessica under her armpits and hauled her out of the pool.

"Move it!" shouted the matron, punctuating her order with a firm slap to Jessica's wet-swimsuit-clad behind.

Jessica yelped and hurried to the locker rooms along with a gaggle of girls who were clearly part of a school group.

"Now see here, lady!" Jessica shouted.

A collective gasp escaped the tender lips of the schoolgirls under the ward of the massive woman now glaring down at Jessica, who backed up a step under her menacing glare.

The woman easily picked Jessica back up by under her arms and proceeded to shake her like a doll, arms and legs flailing around helplessly in the air as Jessica yelped in terror.

“How DARE you! Why, you insolent little brat! Just wait `til I get you back to the school! Any similar outburst from any one of you, and ALL of you will suffer the punishment. I’m counting on all of you to keep her in line, or the staff will put your entire room under strict observance procedures for the evening. You already know what that entails now, don’t you girls?””, and she flings Jessica backwards into the hesitant arms of the cowering teenage girls, most nearly finished drying off from their swimming lessons and back into their boarding school uniforms.

The girls all meekly chime in unison, “Yes, Mrs. Mathews. Self-Control is Group Control”.

“I didn’t hear YOU say it!”, the huge woman again focuses her wrath at Jessica, who is still rattled from her shaking.

“Group Control is Self-Control? What kind of fucked-up?”, and that’s all Jessica managed to voice before feeling the sting of the back of Mrs. Mathew’s hand across her left cheek, bringing her to tears. All the girls gasped at Jessica’s dropping the F-bomb, and they pulled her into their midst and covered her mouth to keep her from getting them in any more trouble for their class than she’s already caused.

Mark my words, I’m going to make little smartypants the star of this evening’s show, believe you me! Now if she isn’t showered, toweled and on the bus back to Saint Mary’s in the next 5 minutes, all of you will share her punishment.”

Jessica had been through a similar case of mistaken age last year, but that time had been her own fault, as she had used her underage appearance to receive a discount on carnival rides at the Fair. Now, here she was, badly needing to pee after her swim in the pool, but holding it in as the girls hurried her out of her wet swimsuit, through a cold shower and a quick towel-off and into...what? Jessica felt cold in the air outside of the pool, and small as she blended right in with the gaggle of pretty girls in similarly modest one-piece bathing suits. At the entrance to the locker room, Jessica felt around the hem of the bathing suit, searching for the small locker key she had safety-pinned to her swimsuit in order not to lose it while she swam at the public pools.

- - - - -

Waking, she was disoriented, and Betty and Lisa ready to take her to the first class of the day. Her stomach gurgled in protest, they hadn't woken her in time for breakfast.

She was weak and distracted through the first lesson. Frankly, it didn't need her full concentration, but it was a struggle to keep it in her head. Jess felt the eye of the teacher on her, multiple times through the class.

She was looking out the window, and wondering how, and when this nightmare would end... when she could make it end...

"Missy Mietje."

The barking of 'her' name drew her back into the class.

"If I'm not boring you, then perhaps you'd like to complete the equation on the board." The teacher's hands were pressed to her hips, and a look of thunder on her face said, she'd 'got' her. The outstretched chalk, like an accusing finger.

Jessica read the equation, as she walked towards the board.

Completing it, she dropped the chalk back into the teacher's hand.

"Think you're so clever..." The teacher snarled....

That was the moment Betty chimed in, "She was telling lies again."

"And to me, too." Lisa's head bobbing in agreement.

Jessica couldn't stop herself, "But, But... I am an adult... this is a mistake..."

She turned from addressing the teacher to the class. There wasn't a single sympathetic face in the entire room.

Grabbing her by the scruff of the neck, she drove her from the class, "Go and see Mother Superior, and tell her you've been lying... again!"

She slams the door, as she leaves Jessica abandoned in the corridor.

The solitude of the corridor felt like the first chance for freedom, for Jessica. Though catching her half-reflection in the glass, she had to admit she did look every inch the student. Swallowing her fear, she knew she didn't look intimidating or even convincing.

But... This was her first real chance. Alone, and hopefully unobserved she walked quietly down the hallway. Stepping lightly past the other classroom doors, she expected someone to shout at her every step of the way. Not knowing where she was heading, if it was towards her freedom, or the Mother Superior's office her heart pounded in her chest.

Finding a stairwell, she looked through the glass panels, they appeared to cover the full height of the building.... and reach all the way to the grounds. As she pressed on the door, it didn't budge an inch. Only a muffled sound, told of it soundly locked, and no trace of give coming from the hinges.

Only fear of being discovered, stopped her from screaming her frustration, or smacking the door with a futile fist.

It felt like a nightmare, the school was truly a prison, and access and egress controlled tightly. Continuing on, afraid of turning back to her class, and the life as Missy Mietje... buried and forgotten until graduation as a broken woman, biddable and obedient. Fighting back the tears welling in the corners of her eyes, she walked on.

The school was a maze, with too many locked doors, ensuring she only had one path forward. Heart pounding in her ears, she kept going.

Fingers fidgeting with the hem of her skirt, as she rounded a corner. 'Mother Superior', an unmissable plaque announced. Jessica retreated back around the corner, her back pressing against the wall, as she wished to disappear. Knowing what was behind, she wiped her eyes with the back of her hands.

Stepping lightly, she knew she had to pass that door. Every footstep she placed with deliberate slowness, afraid of a squeaky sole announcing her presence... her passing...

She was still sniveling a little during the bus ride up to the foreboding walls of the supposedly super strict academy. She whispered an obscenity at her seat-mate on the bus, the girl named Maggie who had cheerfully presented the soap-bar to their teacher, even as the freckle faced girl offered her handkerchief and helped her with a beret for her hair.

“What’s going on back there?”, glared the imposing woman heading the swimming excursion, “You girls are to remain silent during the ride back to St. Mary’s. Any of you who make any more noise will go without dinner tonight. Is that understood?”


“Yes, Sister Beatrice”, said the entire busload of girls in unison, but for Jessica, who realized with a shiver how deep she suddenly into this charade. As she gazed around the bus, she saw seats full of young, lovely girls, all in the same uniforms. As she looked around, one made a face at her, another stuck quickly stuck out her tongue, and then out of nowhere, Maggie darted her fingertips into Jessica’s tender sides and ribs through the fabric of her blouse, causing her to yelp with laughter and reflexively jerk around in her seat. Jessica’s secret weakness was her hopelessly delicate, ticklish nature.

“Girls! I mean it back there! I want quiet all the way back to school!” bellowed the large woman.

“It’s HER, Ma’am. The new girl!”, Maggie whines, “She won’t stop pinching me!”

“That’s a total lie!”, protests Jess, who is quickly silenced by a loud “Shush!” from Sister Beatrice.

The rest of the ride is mostly uneventful, as they pass out of the town proper and through the gates to the wooded grounds surrounding the school. This gives Jessica minutes to look deeper into her situation. As a waifish-looking young reporter seeking her first big break, the idea of somehow sneaking into the notorious school and imitating a student was already in the back of her mind before ever setting foot in town. However, this wasn’t how she’d imagined things going at all. To do it properly required some safety net, or a person outside who could verify her identity. Jessica was totally winging it, assuming the identity of a girl newly transferred to St. Mary’s School. She had no idea where things would lead.

Once inside the main hall of the school, all the girls are lined up facing each other, as Sister Beatrice and another, even taller woman stand at the end of the column, reminding the girls of the school rules. How the girls must never look directly at the adults. How they must always curtsey on entering and upon leaving rooms, must be obedient and display good manners, good posture, and so forth.

The relief Jessica felt was amazing. It was without a doubt, the best feeling she had ever felt. Her stomach slowly shrank and shrank, as she breathed a sigh of relief. The only minor problem was the pain in sitting down.

Eventually, the nun figured it was time for Jessica to get up, and....
143332112112123.title: Jessica gives in

1433321121121231.content:
Get her dressed in a childish uniform.

The uniform is white with pink band around the arms and at the hem of the short skirt. Below that two main pieces, she receive white ankle-socks and thick, white cotton panties.
“This is the punishment-uniform for improvers.” The nun explains.
“That means, that you start in the first grade and can climb up a grade each day, if you behave well and the nuns and teachers find no reason to hold you back.”

Jessica is a bit shocked to start from scratch, but at least she can proceed quickly.

“As I told you, you have to listen to everybody as long as you wear this uniform. If you are a bully and a small first grader reports you, you are in trouble. If a nun sees you misbehaving during lunch-time, you are in trouble. Got the system?”

Jessica nods her head and get dressed as quickly as she can.
“But I am an adult. We wanted to discuss that after my punishment.” She almost whispers.

The nun nods her head and continues:
“And that is what we are doing right now. If you behave well and you are a good student, you will be in the 10th – and final – grade in the middle of next week; being an adult that should be very easy for you. If that happens, you write the final exam and can go wherever you want.”

This sounds almost fair – almost.
“But what happens if I fail a test or get reported?”

“Then you stay in that class for a week – if you don’t get downgraded – before you can be upgraded again.” The nun explains.
“And to be fair, you can always chance from this uniform to the current-class uniform and stay with your class mates until you finally graduate. If you like, you can have the regular first-grader uniform on the spot. Do you want that?”
1433321121121231.title: Got her dressed in a childish uniform...

14333211211212313.content:
"Listen, I understand the punishment. But I have a Masters in journalism. Let me take a test to prove that I have all the knowledge a 10th grader should have, and you can let me go." Jessica said, thinking quickly on her feet.

She was going to get out of ASAP. The only annoyance was her aching bottom, and she scratched it a bit, causing the nun to slap her hand.

"Stop that! Do it again, and you lose the panties." The nun said, Jessica nodding her. The nun continued speaking. "Hmmm....I like that idea. We do have a placement test for new students who come from public schools. We could use that."

"Yes! That sounds great! I'll take that and we can be on our ways and everyone can be happy." Jessica said, feeling a glimmer of hope.

"You know what, you seem to be improving mannerswise. You still need help, but you have been a better girl. I'll approve it." The nun said, as she grabbed her hand, and rushed Jessica through hallways into a small, cramped room, with a computer.

A test started up, and Jessica dove in. All types of questions were asked, causing Jessica a bit of trouble. The test from table manners to astronomy, correct dress attire to theological questions. Their was even a mathematics part where Jessica had to count on her fingers to do what seemed like calculus. Ultimately, the screen display the grade Jessica needed to be put in....

She shows Jessica the results.

Jessica defend herself.
