143332112112123131.title: Preschool!?!?!

1433321121121231311.content:
"I'm sorry, but once you take that test, it automatically registers into the schoolsystem. You'll have to attend preschool for a week, then first grade." The nun said, with an amused smirk to Jessica.

"But....but.....please.....I have a masters in journalism...." Jessica said, tears welling up in her eyes.

Here she was, top of her class, and she just failed a basic test. All the events of the day caught up with her at that moment, and washed over her. Tears began to stream down her face, and Jessica shook with sobs.

The nun whispered some comforting words to Jessica, but nothing seemed to work. Tears kept streaming down her face. Eventually, the nun let Jessica cry right into her shirt, as rocked her silently back and forth. She felt nothing but pity for the girl.

Jessica cried till she felt her eyes could produce no more tears. She was feeling dizzy, confused, sad, angry, and more than depressed. She felt stupid and alone. More tears welled to her eyes, but the nun silently rocked her and removed them.

"Shhh...Jessy, prove you're a big girl, alright? In no time, you will have shown everyone you are an adult and all this was a mistake. But you can only do that if you listen to my exact words." The nun said to Jessica, through the haze of her tears and sorrow.

Jessica nodded along as the nun repeated that Jessica must listen to her. She was right. If she followed along, soon she would be out.

With that thought, Jessica yawned a bit, moved around to become a bit more comfortable, and let the apparoaching sleep overtake her. In her sleep, she....
1433321121121231311.title: Go to preschool, for a week.

14333211211212313112.content:
You open your eyes and find yourself walking through a big iron gate. When you look up you can see the three big letters SMS. At your feet, you see and feel your favourite high heels and the tight strap around your chest tells you, that you wear your double push-up bra, which makes you a nice B-Cup.

You walk on and see a nun, that is only slightly taller than you, pushing a little girl in front of her. The girl wears a school uniform and below her short skirt you can see pink training pants.

“Better get that potty pants away from my dress.” You say and the nun nod in agreement. She pushes the girl forward and as they pass you, you can see the pink and fresh spanked behind of the girl.

Smiling, you walk on until you reach your car, a Porsche 911. You jump in and start the engine.
“Oh, I will never see this place again – and I will not miss it.” You say to yourself and take a cigarette out of your handbag, which sits on the passenger seat.
(You do not remember to smoke, but it makes you feel mature.)

You suck the air through the cigarette and blow it out of your nose, while you start the engine…

“Jessy… Jessy… wake up little one. This is not the way to show me that you are a grown up.” You hear the nun say.
Still groggy from your short dream you look up at her until you realize that…
14333211211212313112.title: Dreamed of adulthood

143332112112123131122.content:
Waking up in a dimly lit room is odd enough, but waking up with a foreign object in your mouth only made it worse. You put the shape of the object and being asleep together, and quickly jerk your thumb out of your mouth. A bit disgusted, you wipe the wet thumb on the bed and sat up to look at the nun, who was sitting in a nice wooden chair.

"Suck your thumb often, little Jessy?" The nun said with a smug smirk.

"Uhh....no...I was...dreaming....where am i?" You said, shaking a bit from the chill in the room. You look down and see that you are in a cute pink striped pajama set, and on a bed.

"Well you were ducking your thumb for your entire nap, so I dont know if I believe you. And you are in your new room!" The nun said, as you sat up on the edge of the bed.

"Room?...Wait, how long was I asleep?" Jessica said, standing up to stretch her legs a bit, and noticing some cute little bunny slippers by the bed.

"A few hours. And yes, your room. Well, more like, your shared room. You have two roommates, but they are out doing something." The nun said, as Jessica cutely stretched and yawned a bit.

Shaking a bit from the chill, Jessica pulled the thick blanket around herself.

"Now, you have one of the nicer rooms. You will keep it during your entire stay if you stay a good girl.....am I understood?" The nun said, as Jessica nodded from compulsion.

"Yes...I'll be a good girl, of course." Jessica said, not wanting to take the nice room for granted. She could only imagine what a bad room was like.

Her thoughts were interrupted by her stomach loudly growling, much to Jessica's chagrin, and the nun's amusement. Jessica rubbed her stomach from the full pain.

"Where's the lunch room? I'm famished...." Jessica said.

"I want you, before you start sentences, to say Ma'am or Miss. None of this casual business. Try again." The nun said with a grin.

Jessica, grinding her teeth in anger, tried again, which satisfied the nun.

"It will be dinner in about twenty minutes. You have uniforms in your closet. Make it fast." The nun said, staying sitting.

Jessica noticed the closet to her right, and opened it. Much to her sorrow, it was full of the humilatingly pink uniforms. At its bottom were white tights, some Mary Jane shoes. No bra's, or camisoles, of course.
Jessica was ready to change, but was a bit uncomfortable around the nun. Should she ask her to leave.....

1433321121121231311222.content:
You feel a bit uneasy with the nun around, but you do not want to make her angry. Therefore you let the blanket slide to the floor and starts to take off your pajama. As you slide down the pants, you suddenly feel your behind touch something warm.
Surprised you turn around and find the nun, right behind you.
“Let me help you dear.” She hums and helps your feet out of the leg holes. When she get up again, her hand slide up your leg and over your behind.

You shiver a bit, not sure if you should stop her or not.

Finally her hands got off your behind and she lifts the pink dress up.
“Arms up.” She orders and helps you to get into the dress.

You are sure it is not an accident, that her fingertips touch your sides while she is doing this and you shiver a bit.

“Is everything okay? Do I make you uncomfortable?” She asks.

YES! Would be the honest answer, but you shake your head like an obedient little girl.
“Miss, no Miss.” You say and feel stupid to be so submissive.

She grins and kneels down in front of you to help your feet into the socks, before she slide on your Mary Janes.
It feels strange and forbidden. One the one hand she behaves like a Maid, on the other hand you are very sure, that she is the predator and you are her victim.

When she has your feet in the shoes, she gets up and let her hands slide up your naked legs. The contact ends, just before she reaches your crotch and you let out a sigh of relief. Unfortunately she is misunderstanding your reaction.
“Come to me before you go to bed. I can help you to dress in your pajama. You are such a cutie.”

You only smile and hope you find an excuse before it is time to go to bed. Finally she leads you to the lunch room and shows you the table for the first grader.

Choose an Option:
1. First-Grader are still feed by assistant’s
2. First Grader eat alone, but drink from sipping cuts.
3. All is normal, only the table is lower.
1433321121121231311222.title: Let her stay and watch...

choices: She goes to the neery table
She goes to the popular girls table
14333211211212313112223.content:
You breath a sigh of relief upon seeing the table where you must sit. It was a little lower to the ground, and pink with small little plastic chairs, but the girls around the table sat and ate alone.

"Before you go, I want you to be a convincing and real 1st grader. Try any little stunts and you'll end up punished. I am understood." The nun said before letting you walk to the table.

Biting whatever coarse words you want to say, you simply nod and say "Yes Ma'am."

"Good, good. Now be good little Jessy." The nun said, squeezing your bottom lightly and discretely before making you walk to what seemed like the cafeteria.

Going in, you didnt know what to think. But the food looked simply amazing. You understood now why some parents sent their kids here, no public school could compare.

Your stomach grumbled at the sight of all the food. Grabbing one of the plastic trays, you piled it high with your favorites, and then headed out the door marked exit. Not before being stopped by a tall lady in nun's ropes.

"New here, misty? Swipe your card please." The nun said, pointing towards what looked like a card machine.

"Uhh...uhm....I have to pay for this?" You stuttered out, forgetting that from high school.

"You really are new here! No, mommy and daddy pay for it. What's your name sweetie?" The lunch lady said, taking on a patronizing tone.

"Jessica...I'm not sure I have a...." you said, feeling frantically around for a card. You discover one in your breast pocket. It has a photo of you, taken with you eyes closed and thumb in your mouth. Dammit. "...card, Ma'am."

"There it is! Off you go little jessy!" The nun said, taking anand swiping the card for you. "Don't forget a drink!" She finished off with, handing you some prune juice in your unoccupied hand.

Great. Prune juice. Jessica sighed. Now to find a place to devour this stuff. A few spots looked open.

For one, their was a table with some more nerdy looking girls at it, some with books, others with caddies games.

At the second table, their was done more popular look girls. But they sort of gave off a bitchy vibe.

Jessica sighed, and started walking to one table. How bad could some first graders be?
14333211211212313112223.title: 3.	All is normal, only the table is lower.

143332112112123131122232.content:
Jessica rather has strong allies than weak ones – and usually the popular kids have good connections in all directions. Therefore she walks over to them and sits down.
“Hi guys.” She greets them and starts to eat.

The girls at her table looked at each other, but ignored her for a while.
“Okay, I do not have time for this shit!” Jessica thinks and takes a sip of her prune juice, only to be able to say:
“Uags, that is horrible. I can’t believe they force us to drink that stuff.”

The other girls nod in agreement, until a blond and very pretty one talks to her.
“Hey, I am Mandy. Are you new?”

Jessica could clap her hands in joy and nods her head.
“Yes, I am Jessica and I just arrived. I still can’t believe that I am here.”

Mandy nods her head.
“Yes, the place is pretty cool. Okay, the nuns are strict, but the dorms are great, the food is great and the courses are great as well. I could never choose between so many of them. What courses did you choose?”

Jessica feels a bit stupid. First of all she hates the place, no matter how great the food is and how nice the dorms are. She is an adult and rather earns money and prices for investigative journalism than spending her time with kids and religious bullshit and… and stuff she don’t even know.
“I… I didn’t care and just picked some random courses.” She says and sees the facial expression of Mandy slip.

“How can you not care? Some courses are so useless and others are awesome. I have makeup class and tailoring. I will be famous and rich in no time.” Mandy says, smiling from ear to ear.

Jessica tries to smile, but she did not succeed. The more she talks with Mandy, the less she likes the girl.
“Uhm, sure you will be. Hey, can you tell me how to get out of the school. I have a boyfriend and like to meet him outside.”

Mandy and the other girls looked at each other. Than Mandy laughed out and almost spilled her juice over the table.
“Hey, right. A boyfriend. Okay catfish, you can stop pretending now.”

Jessica feels hurt and gets a bit angry.
“I am not lying. I have a boyfriend and… and we kiss a lot.”

Mandy giggles and her friends do the same. Somehow they do not believe you. Are they to immature to understand what you are talking about? Finally Mandy stops and whispers with two other girls, before she push three glasses of prune-juice to your plate.
“Okay, we make a deal. You drink this and I tell you how to get out of the school. But first you have to drink all of it.”

Jessica is surprised and suspicious. It can’t be that easy – but maybe it is and she only have to drink three glasses of this horrible juice to get home…
143332112112123131122232.title: She goes to the popular girls table

1433321121121231311222321.content:
"Alright, I'll drink it. You better know a good way out." Jessica said, hastily grabbing a bottle of the prune juice and starting to chug it down.

The after taste was what made Jessica gag most. It was more than disgusting, it was horrid. However, after the first glass, Jessica resolved to finish her task. Down went the second, than the third.

Gagging heavily, and almost vomiting, Jessica felt her eyes watering. Jesus Christ, the feeling of the prune juice settling in her stomach hurt worse than anything, her stomach felt strained.

"Okay...I did it. Now what's the way out?" Jessica solemnly said out from the pain in her stomach.

"Easy....Listen closely..." Mandy said, as Jessica leaned forward as she fell into a whisper.

"In 11 years, graduate!" Mandy said, causing all the girls laugh and giggle, giving each other high fives as Jessica pouted. She had been tricked by some stupid young girls.

"That's....you promised!" Jessica said, crossing her shoulders angrily.

"And I gave you an answer. Gosh, drama queen!" Mandy said, rolling her eyes, but seeming to nod to Jessica. It seemed she had been accepted into the group.

They chatted as Jessica listened I, adding passive aggressive quips which caused everyone to laugh. Meanwhile, Jessica's stomach churned and hurt.....

Eventually, a bell rung loudly, breaking up lunch. In no time, the nun who made Jessica eat her out was there, ready to take Jessica back to her room.

Jessica stomach cried out in pain. Perhaps she could go to the nurse for some medicine....

“Well, sounds like you got your bowels up to speed. You can expect to have a satisfying MEETING on the toilet, but what can I do to help you?” The nurse asks.

"I have a nice plastic potty you can use, sweetie." The nurse said, stroking Jessica's cheek with one hand, and taking Jessica's left hand with the other. Jessica, a bit shocked by all this, had no idea what to say.

"Come along then. I'll let you have some privacy in my office." The nurse said, pulling Jessica along.

Hearing the click of the nurses heels on the floor, and seeing them a stereotypical latex red, only reminded Jessica of how the nurse seemed to embody a fetish of nurses.

Eventually, Jessica found herself seated on a plastic potty, hidden lightly behind a medical screen. One could see shadows through the screen, but Jessica hoped nothing else.

"You have nothing for me to take?" Jessica moaned, in pain. Her stomach grumbled and rumbled, with sharp shooting shocks of pain hitting her colon.

"I'm sorry honey, I really am." The nurse said, leaning over and moving a bit of hair out of Jessica's face. At this angle, Jessica could see every part of her cleavage, in its bountiful glory.

"I just have rules, and unless your file says you have medicine, impossible." The nurse said, putting her hand on Jessica's stomach as if she were expecting a kick to come back.

"It hurts....it hurts so much." Jessica said, pain shooting down her spine. It was a mixture of dizziness and shock that made her feel like her world was ending.

"Awww, you are just heart wrenching....I suggest you get ready, because I imagine that stomach pain of yours will come out quick and fast..." the nurse stated almost with glee, pushing slightly on Jessica's puffed out stomach.

Eventually, after prodding and poking Jessica a bit more, the nurse left. Jessica pulled the screen shut around her, and swiftly removed any impediments to using the bathroom.

And it wasn't a moment too soon. Before Jessica realized it, with a cacophony of noise, all the pain in her stomach relieved itself. It was humilating, disgusting, more than gross, but the pain was gone. She was sore, and tired, but not crying out from pain.

After a few minutes of just resting, with her legs spread wide, even without any covering, Jessica heard the office door open. The nurse opened the screen up, causing a tiny shriek from the partially nude Jessica.

"Oh my, do not worry, you are not the first girl I've seen naked. I'm a nurse, and I'm hear to help." She said, licking her cherry red lips.

"Here's some toilet paper, towels and wet wipes. I hope I do not need to show you how to use them." The nurse said, giggly.

****

Jessica emerged from the office a new woman. She felt fresh, new and awake. The nurses office had a side room, complete with a tiny shower. Jessica could swear something felt off about the room, but she quickly showered, cleaned herself up, and came out.

The nurse was on her computer, seeming to be working.

"Are we all done? Feeling better?" She said, getting up and approaching Jessica, resting her hand on Jessica's stomach.

Jessica nodded, and felt herself gulp a bit. Examining the nurses cleavage as subtle as she could, she tried to spot a nipple or a bra. But in her busty state, the nurse seemed to have disguised both.

"Not talkative much, are you honey. I have one last question for you. Do you think you will need any of these?" The nurse said, gesturing to some diapers which were laid out on the patient bed, seemingly ready to be taken.

"I know it might be embarrassing, but again, I'm only trying to help. You could wear them at night for your protection. Besides, they are a nice princess design! Only you and I would know, I promise." The nurse said, putting her pinky out as if to make a promise.

Jessica thought it over...The nurse seemed nice, and it would be good to have someone on her side. She could take the things and never wear them...

Jessica tried to formulate a plan. Surely one of these girls knew a way out. If so, she had to try to befriend as many as possible.

There were bunches of groups, but they were in sections for older grades. If one thing was true, it was that Jessica was stuck with her current crop of people to choose from.

Thus, her eyes settled on the nerds. It was a sad bunch, none looked pleased to be here, but they had an opening. Jessica sat down with her tray and waited to introduce herself.

"We saw you sitting with you all the cool girls." One of the girls said cattily, as they all turned to her. "Why are you here now?

A small horus of yeahs loudly agreed with the girl. Jessica blushed furiously, not expecting this amount of cattiness from a bunch of 1st graders.

"New here. I'm just looking for some friends." Jessica said, a bit desperately. These were rhe smart girls, they could help the most.

"Fine. But don't expect us to be like them. And listen to us, understood?" The 'leader' seemed to say, getting a nod from Jessica.

Jessica silently listened to the girls dialogue and chatter. She learned the useless chatter, the stupid little petty school rumors, and the leaders name. Amanada.

Near the end up dinner, it seemed all the girls wanted to talk to Jessica. They seemed to all be offering her food from their plates, the vegetables and other unsweet stuff.

"You want to be friends with us. Then eat the vegetables." Amanada said, with a grin.

Jessica realized with a bit of shock that the same thing has happened with the popular girls this morning, if for different reasons. She gulped down a bit.

****

Walking back fo her for, Jessica sighed from pain a bit. She had done what the girls asked, feeling powerless. Surrounded by them, she felt pressured to swallow every possible bite, and eventually, it was over. She couldn't remember all that she ate, but it certainly was much to much.

Jessica laid down on her bed, and sleepily groaned. She felt like it was Thanksgiving, stuffed from all the food.

Suddenly, she remembered the diaper. Perhaps she should try to get it on?
14333211211212313112223211112.title: Find a new group

143332112112123131122232111121.content:
Jessica tries to avoid the diaper and slowly walk o the bathroom. She close the door of the stall and prays for relief. She pees a bit, but her stomach still feels hard as a rock. She wait longer, until the light gets switched off.
“Hello! I am still in here!” She calls out, feeling a bit scared in the sudden darkness.

The light goes on again and the door of the bathroom opens.
“Who is in here? It is past bedtime, get out now!” An angry voice calls.

Jessica quickly jumps from the toilet, pulls up her panties and run out. She tries to run past the tall nun, but gets stopped.
“Haven’t you forgotten anything?” The unknown nun asks.

Jessica tries to think about what she might forgot, or simply don’t know, because she never learned any of the school-rules. Desperate to do the right thing, she lift the skirt of her dress and present her panties for an inspection.
The nun chuckles and shakes her head.
“Okay, I guess you just went from trainers to panties and are used to this kind of inspection, but I wanted you to wash your hands, little girl.” She looks down and raise a brow. “And I have to tell you, that you did not wiped after you went tinkling. Maybe you are not ready to handle panties.”

Jessica blushes deep red and looks down. The nun is right, in her hurry she forgot to wipe and has a little spot on the front of her panties.
“I am very sorry Ma’am, I will do better next time.” She apologies in her best submissive voice.

The nun seems pleased and let her wash her hands, before she sends Jessica to her room.

Back in her little room, Jessica still suffers in pain and finally decide to put the diaper on.
“If I make a mess in the bed, I am in deep… trouble.” She says to herself and tapes the thick diaper on. It is indeed cute, but would make her waddle a bit when she would need to walk with it. For the night it was fine – even comfortable and Jessica snuggles into the bed, trying to forget about the pain in her stomach.

To discover that Mrs. Bradley was nowhere in sight. Instead there was a group of seven matronly women around Mrs. Bradley's age, along with one girl who was wearing a T-shirt from the local community college.

"And who are you?"

"Um, I'm Jessica. Where's Mrs. Bradley?" Jessica answered.

"Oh, she had to step out for a minute. She discovered that she was out of soda water and decided to run to the store to get it."

There was a round of introductions, but as the rush of names flowed over her, Jessica only caught a few of them. Mrs. Hascomb (who was doing most of the talking), Mrs. Lakeside, and Mrs. Waterfield. As for the girl, her name was Brittany and she was either Mrs. Lakeside or Mrs. Waterfield's daughter.

"I take it that you've moved in next door and your parents asked Mrs. Bradley to watch you?" Mrs. Hascomb said.

"Moving is always so chaotic." Mrs. Lakeside commented. "It's not a time to have a child underfoot."

"I'm not a child." Jessica asserted. "I own the house next door and my parents live in another state."

Polite laughter met her words. Looking at their faces, Jessica saw that not one of them believed her story. her true story.

"It's true!" Jessica insisted.

She continued to insist as their laughter faded, being replaced with annoyance.

"You shouldn't tell fibs." Mrs. Hascomb chided.

"I'm not lying." Jessica insisted. "I know I'm short, but I'm an adult."

"Jessica, when your parents dropped you off, did Mrs. Bradley happen to mention what she keeps on her kitchen wall?" Mrs. Lakeside probed. "The thing on the hook?"

"Look, no one dropped me off." Jessica told them. "I came over by myself. And yes, I did see Mother's Little Helper. Maybe I should just go home now."

"Are your parents at home?" Mrs. Waterfield asked.

"Maybe, but since they live in another state I don't know if they are." Jessica told them.

"Maybe Mrs. Bradley should have done more than just show you that razor strap?" Mrs. Waterfield countered.

"Of course you can't go home if your parents aren't there." Mrs. Hascomb told her.

Jessica disagreed, but the women were all insisting. Sometime during the conversation, Mrs. Waterfield disappeared. Jessica didn't notice the woman leaving, only that she returned with the razor strap.

152212211122211222212321123.content:
Suddenly, all the power in the building went out.

"What's going on?" Jessica asked.

The receptionist ignores her, and starts walking towards Jessica. Jessica gulps and tightly grabs Beatrice's hand, unaware of how childish it looks.

"I'm sorry, but until the power is back on, we're going to have to keep her here. We can't risk any of our students leaving the property." the receptionist says.

Jessica can't believe what she's hearing.

"I'm an adult, you can't do this!"

"An adult in this town should know not to wear one of our uniforms." The receptionist turns towards Beatrice. "The power should be restored by Monday. Come pick this girl up then, or come later. If you don't return by next Friday, we'll register her in the system. That is... unless she's already one of ours."

Jessica is shocked at what she's hearing. It's Friday, and she had to stay here and be treated like a student for at least the weekend, and she had no way to prove that she was an adult. She wasn't even sure if Beatrice believed her.

Beatrice, seemingly disappointed, releases Jessica's hand.
"Jessica... Monday to Friday is my work week. I don't know if I can come back."

"What?! You can't just leave me here! I'm an adult!"

"Are you though? When I first met you, you were wearing a wet diaper. Even now, I can see your panties are wet. I don't know many adults that wet themselves. Call one of your friends to come pick you up on Monday, I'm very sorry, but I can't."

"I'm an adult! If someone takes me home, I can prove it! I don't have any friends here, I moved in less than a fucking week ago!"

The receptionist speaks up.
"YOUNG LADY! That language is not tolerated here. Your story matches what we hear from girls all the time, they just moved here and it's a mistake, or they're actually adults, if we take them home they'll prove it. You know what happens when we've taken girls out to 'prove' that they are adults? They try to escape, and then we are held accountable for anything they do while they're gone. You clearly aren't an adult, and you better stop that lie right now. If you're a big girl and show that you're a respectful and responsible young lady, there will be no need to enroll you. I will judge you over the weekend, and if you seem like you're mature, I'll make sure you can leave Monday, even if this lady cant pick you up. So far you're acting like adult small child, and that's how you'll be treated until you can show that you're big girl."

Beatrice starts to leave, and tears start to fall down Jessica's face.
"Beatrice! Please, please, PLEASE, come back as soon as you can. I'll pay you, I promise I'm not in their system. Just please come get me on Monday!"

Beatrice looks at Jessica sadly.
"I can't darling. But you heard the nice lady. If you're a good girl, you can leave Monday! I'll be at the daycare, come by and I'll give you a ride home to make up for it."

Jessica starts getting angry, but realizes there's nothing she can do.
"Fine. Thanks for nothing." she says harshly.

Beatrice wines at this, clearly a bit hurt by that. She starts to say something, but stops herself. She waves, and leaves the building.

"Now young lady. I can tell already that you're a liar and very rude, so we're going to set you up in the naughty girl dorm. It's where all the young troublemaking girls stay, from ages 8 to 14. I can't take your word for your age, but you seem about 10 to 12 years old so that should be a perfect fit."

"What?! If I have to stay here, at least let me stay with the senior highschool girls. They're the closest to my age, I graduated only a couple years ago!"

"Jessie... stop it. No more lying. If you don't want to tell me your real age, that's ok. But no more telling me you're an adult."

"This is unfair!"

Beatrice starts pulling Jessica through the hallway. After taking a few turns, she takes out a key and opens a pink door. A familiar smell greets Jessica...

Baby powder.

She gets led in, and realizes she's in what looks like a room meant to hold babies. Toy boxes are set up along the wall, each one filled to the brim with dolls, action figures, games, and more. There is a tall playpen set up in the corner. There are several high chairs. A few baby bouncers. A changing table, with seemingly endless diapers.

Jessica stands with her mouth agape.
"What is this? I thought you said I'll be with 8 to 14 year olds?"

"We will head there in a second. I heard the lady say you have issues with your bladder. And that you were wearing a diaper earlier. Clearly they aren't new to you, and we can't afford to have you pee on anything, especially the beds. You will be diapered for the weekend."

"You can't do...!"

The receptionist, who's nametag Jessica reads as "Patty," shoves a pacifier in Jessica's mouth.

"Keep that in while I change you, or you're getting a spanking."

Weakly, because she was facing the corner with her hands on her head and red bottom showing. It was impossible to make a strong declaration when she looked like a well spanked little girl.

"Fine." Mrs. Bradley told her. "Now are you leaving by the front door or the backdoor?"

"Huh?"

Mrs. Bradley spoke slowly, as if speaking to a dimwitted child.

"Are you going to walk through my bridge group and leave by the kitchen door or are you leaving by the front door?" Mrs. Bradley explained.

Jessica thought it was an impossible choice. On one hand she would have to face all of those women again and dare to walk past Mother's Little Helper. On the other, she risked being seen on the street.

Mrs. Bradley merely nodded. Taking Jessica by the arm Mrs. Bradley pulled Jessica from the corner and escorted her to the front door. After opening the door, Mrs. Bradley paused.

"Oh, I might have forgotten to mention something." Mrs. Bradley purred. "Anyone who spots a naked girl on the street is going to assume that she's escaped from St Mary's School for Girls. All of those girls know what's going to happen if they're spotted off school grounds so they ditch their uniforms as fast as they can. And if they don't take you back there then if you're lucky whoever sees you is going to turn you over to the police."

"What?" Jessica protested.

Then Mrs. Bradley shoved her out and slammed the door after her, leaving Jessica naked on a public street.

Jessica shivered. She was naked on a public street. Naked in a town where no one knew her. If someone saw her then Jessica knew that Mrs. Bradley would be no help at all.

She wanted to cover herself, but didn't dare take the time to do so. With arms and legs pelting, Jessica dashed home. The moment she made it in her door she locked it and turned on her alarm system. Then, running, she locked her backdoor and then dashed naked to secure all the windows, closing the drapes as she did.

Only then did she feel safe.

Her confidence began to return. She could tell all those women about her niece visiting. A niece who lived in another state and might never visit again. Once they saw her in her padded clothes then they wouldn't think that they had seen Jessica. Yes, it would all work out for her.

Ointments and creams helped, but Jessica didn't want anything touching her throbbing bottom. With it bare, Jessica decided that she didn't need to wear a top. Not that she was accepting the 'nude for a day' sentence, but Jessica just didn't feel like dressing.

She woke nude. Her bottom and legs were still sore but they felt far better than it had yesterday. Dressing, Jessica vowed that nothing like would ever happen to her again. She wouldn't tempt fate in any way, not even by doing a story on St Mary's School for Girls. She'd meet this day with a smile and open a new chapter of her life while permanently closing this one.

Her clothes were dry! They were toasty hot, but they were ready to wear. And her padding! The expensive padding had survived both the washer and the dryer. Cheaper ones wouldn't have, but Jessica had paid for the best and they were still wearable.

But hot from the dryer. When Jessica tried to position one, she winced in pain. It would be near agony to wear them, especially on her throbbing bottom.

Jessica bit back a scream as she put the hot pads in place. Then she dressed, shoving everything where it belonged. In a flash she had gone from being a well spanked little girl and become a grown woman. One with a red, tear streaked face, but a grown woman none the less.

But it hurt! It was more than just the hot pads, it was the sting of clothes touching her strapped bottom and legs. Ironically, Jessica wanted to nothing more than to strip off, but she knew that she couldn't. Not in this house.

All that remained now was to return to the safety of her own house. She had seen enough of Mrs. Bradley's house to know that she could probably reach the front door without being spotted, but now that she was dressed a part of her wanted to confront the bridge club about its mistake. To rub it in their faces that they had mistaken her for a girl and now should pray that she didn't press charges.

Not that she would. No, she couldn't picture telling a police officer about what had happened, but they didn't know that. And it would be so wonderful to see their faces as they worried about what she might do.

Through the door together they went, and Jessica, dressed in her cartoon underwear, soon found herself standing in a room full of middle aged women. One of the girls, Brittany, appeared to be in her late teens and was wearing a T-shirt from the community college, but the rest appeared to be Mrs. Brady's age.

"Jessica, what's the meaning of this, why are you in your underwear?" Mrs. Brady said. Jimmy, who didn't appear to be very bright, laughed merrily.

"It's okay," one of the woman said. "I mean, it's not like she's an adult. My little girl used to like around the house in her underwear all the time. Harmless, really. In fact, I'd put on the music and let her dance for us that way."

info.brief_description: young looking petite woman gets mistaken for a child
info.description:
Jessica Summers has just moved to a new town across the country from everything she knew. she got a job as a journalist but doesn't start for another couple of weeks. she doesn't talk to her family and has left the few friends she had behind.
Jessica is a sweet looking blonde with long straight hair that she usually has up in a smart bun or down when shes at home. being only 4 foot 5 inches tall she tends to wear heels all the time shes out in public. she also doesn't have a very curvy figure or large breasts. she hates how young her body looks and compensates with padded bras and special shaping panties. every outfit she owns is designed to make sure her thin figure looks curvy and feminine. without makeup she could pass for 12 so she never is without it and always carries her I.D

the city shes moved to is known for its famed boarding school St Marys School for Girls. it is often used by parents with difficult children, but they always leave as polite young ladies due to their methods such as spanking, caning and even scrubbing out verbally disobedient girls mouths with soap.

no one knows her yet, not even her new neighbors. this story is to allow a lot of mistaken identity scenarios to be played out.
the story was inspired by stories i have read on sites such as Beyondthemagicboxxx and Daring Diane's blog.

rules:
1. everyone she meets is new, no one popping up from her life before she moved
2. no one line chapters please. if you are making a bridging chapter that is ok as long as you also fill one of your options with a full chapter afterwards.
3. no deaths please.
